channel.title: Tut island starter....just look and help
channel.description:
ok i dont know how to do this and im acuatly honestly looking for a guide or "giveaway"
i want it to when u first log in your character you start at the tut island fighting part(rat cage) but when u r done or use a home command/tele u goto the home i coded. could some one make me a code/command/w/e for this to happen. and a command so when u leave the tut island u get a xp bonus and a starter. couldsomeone help me?? ty

item.title: Tut island starter....just look and help
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Change the initial coords in the player class… For whatever action you last do on tut island (you can teleport there on your server, it’s south of Karamja I believe), just call the method which teleports you to home:

public void home() { toX = int; toY = int; }
and give you the bonuses your desire.

if(command.startsWith("home")) { home(); }

Read full topic
